title: Configuration dialog missing in 1.77.2
author: GeriZ
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
I would expect the configuration dialog under "View"

## Current Behavior
The configuration dialog under "View" is missing

## Workaround
"Reset layout" opens the configuration dialog

## Context
I cannot edit my existing and new server connections

## Your Environment
Windows 10 Pro 21H2 19044.1645 x64
